title: Côte de boeuf with blue cheese butter and sautéed girolle mushrooms and potatoes
description: Try Matt Tebbut’s perfectly cooked côte de boeuf  topped with melting blue cheese butter for a classy steak supper.
ingredients: 2 x 800g/1lb 12 oz côte de boeuf steaks (bone-in rib-eye steaks)
salt and freshly ground black pepper
400g/14oz floury potatoes, peeled, cut into 0.5cm/½in cubes, blanched
